statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 20 \\ -12 \\ 0 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -31 \\ -51 \\ 27 \\ 2 \\ -31 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
